channel.title: 667 Help with Npc's

item.title: 667 Help with Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Does anyone know how to make the npcs stop from moving?

I tried NPC.java

if (isForceWalking()) { if (getFreezeDelay() < Utils.currentTimeMillis()) { setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 519) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 550) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 546) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 549) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 683) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 2676) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 445) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 2732) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 4906) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 2830) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 198) setRandomWalk(false); if(id == 239) setRandomWalk(false);

But I donâ€™t work :c

Read full topic
